languages.text: {n}Преподобный Адальберт, пухлый и розовощекий старик, неспешно зажигает свечи. Блики огня пляшут на тяжелой золотой аквиле и в небесно-голубых глазах преподобного, когда он с улыбкой обращается к вам:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Император{/g} защищает, Ваша Светлость. Пришли за молитвою, или дела насущные привели вас ко мне?" {n}Его голос обладает необыкновенной глубиной и завораживающим тембром.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [draft] Просто нарративный диалог с вопросам и ответами

languages.text: {n}Confessor Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on his heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he addresses you, smiling.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There is an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and he speaks with mesmerising timbre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Преподобный Адальберт, пухлый и розовощекий старик, неспешно зажигает свечи. Пришли за молитвою, или дела насущные привели вас ко мне?" {n}Его голос обладает необыкновенной глубиной и завораживающим тембром.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reverend Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on the reverend's heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he speaks to you, smiling.{/n} "The Emperor protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There's an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and its timbre is mesmerising.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le confesseur Adalbert, un homme grassouillet aux joues roses, allume tranquillement des cierges dont les flammes se reflètent sur son Aquila doré et dans ses yeux bleu clair. Il vous salue en souriant.{/n} « L'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Empereur{/g} protège, Votre Seigneurie. Êtes-vous {mf|venu|venue} prier ou est-ce une affaire plus terre à terre qui vous amène aujourd'hui ? » {n}demande-t-il d'une voix incroyablement profonde au timbre captivant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on his heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he addresses you, smiling.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There is an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and he speaks with mesmerising timbre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le révérend Adalbert, un homme grassouillet aux joues roses, allume tranquillement des cierges dont les flammes se reflètent sur son Aquila doré et dans ses yeux bleu clair. Il vous salue en souriant.{/n} « L'Empereur protège, Votre Seigneurie. Êtes-vous {mf|venu|venue} prier ou est-ce une affaire plus terre à terre qui vous amène aujourd'hui ? » {n}demande-t-il d'une voix incroyablement profonde au timbre captivant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El confesor Adalbert, un anciano rollizo de mejillas sonrosadas, está encendiendo unas velas con bastante parsimonia. Cuando se gira hacia ti con una sonrisa, el brillo de las llamas se refleja en su pesada Aquila de oro y en sus ojos azul celeste.{/n} «El {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperador{/g} protege, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿Viene para orar, o acaso le traen asuntos más mundanos?». {n}Su voz es increíblemente grave y resuena con un timbre hipnótico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on his heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he addresses you, smiling.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There is an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and he speaks with mesmerising timbre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El reverendo Adalbert, un anciano rollizo de mejillas sonrosadas, está encendiendo unas velas con bastante parsimonia. Cuando se gira hacia ti con una sonrisa, el brillo de las llamas se refleja en su pesada Aquila de oro y en sus ojos azul celeste.{/n} «El Emperador protege, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿Viene para orar, o acaso le traen asuntos más mundanos?». {n}Su voz es increíblemente grave y resuena con un timbre hipnótico.{/n}

languages.text: {n}告解神父阿达伯特是位身材发福、面色红润的老人，他正在慢慢点着蜡烛。当他微笑着对你开口时，沉重的金色双头鹰吊坠和他天蓝色的眼睛里闪烁着火光。{/n}“愿{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}帝皇{/g}保佑您，大人。您是来祷告的，还是有世俗的事情需要找我讨论？”{n}他的声音中带着某种难以言喻的深沉，他的嗓音带着令人着迷的力量。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on his heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he addresses you, smiling.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There is an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and he speaks with mesmerising timbre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特牧师，一个身材发福、面色红润的老人，正在慢慢地点着蜡烛。当他微笑着对你开口时，沉重的金色双头鹰吊坠和他天蓝色的眼睛里闪烁着火光。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑您，大人。您是来祷告的，还是有世俗的事情需要找我讨论？”{n}他的声音中带着某种难以言喻的深沉，他的嗓音带着令人着迷的力量。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ふくよかでバラ色の頬をした老人、聴罪師アダルバートが、キャンドルを灯している。一つ一つを灯すのに時間をかけている。炎の輝きが重厚な金色のアクィラと彼の空のように青い目の中で舞う。彼は微笑みながらあなたに声をかけた{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}皇帝{/g}のご加護を、陛下。祈りを捧げに来たのですか？それとも俗世の用事で来たのですか？」{n}彼の声には信じられないほど深みがあり、魅惑的な音色で話した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on his heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he addresses you, smiling.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There is an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and he speaks with mesmerising timbre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ふくよかでバラ色の頬をした老人、アダルバート牧師が、キャンドルを灯している。一つ一つを灯すのに時間をかけている。重い金色のアクィラと空色の瞳に炎の輝きが彼の空のように青い目の中で舞う。彼は微笑みながらあなたに声をかけた {/n}「皇帝陛下がお守りです。祈りを捧げに来たのですか？それとも俗世の用事で来たのですか？」{n}彼の声には信じられないほど深みがあり、魅惑的な音色で話した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Konfessor Adalbert, ein plumper, rotwangiger alter Mann, entzündet Kerzen. Er lässt sich für jede ausnehmend viel Zeit. Feuerfunken tanzen auf seinem schweren goldenen Aquila und in seinen himmelblauen Augen, als er dich lächelnd anspricht.{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Imperator{/g} schützt uns, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Seid Ihr zum Beten gekommen oder führen Euch weltliche Angelegenheiten zu mir?" {n}Seine Stimme hat eine profunde Qualität, und er spricht mit einer hypnotisierenden Klangfarbe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on his heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he addresses you, smiling.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There is an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and he speaks with mesmerising timbre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reverend Adalbert, ein plumper, rotwangiger alter Mann, entzündet Kerzen. Er lässt sich für jede ausnehmend viel Zeit. Feuerfunken tanzen auf seinem schweren goldenen Aquila und in seinen himmelblauen Augen, als er dich lächelnd anspricht.{/n} "Der Imperator schützt uns, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Seid Ihr zum Beten gekommen oder führen Euch weltliche Angelegenheiten zu mir?" {n}Seine Stimme hat eine ungeheuer profunde Qualität, und er spricht mit einer hypnotisierenden Klangfarbe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tombul, pembe yanaklı bir ihtiyar olan Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert yavaş yavaş mumları yakıyor. Ateşlerin ışıkları, hem ağır altın Çift Başlı Kartal'ının üzerinden hem de gök mavisi gözlerinden yansıyor. Gülümseyerek seninle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}İmparator{/g} korur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Dua etmek için mi geldiniz yoksa sizi bana getiren şey günlük meseleler midir?" {n}Sesinde muazzam derin bir kalite var ve büyüleyici bir tınıyla konuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Confessor Adalbert, a plump, rosy-cheeked old man, is lighting candles, taking his time with each. Glints of fire dance on his heavy golden Aquila and in his sky-blue eyes as he addresses you, smiling.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} protects, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Are you here to pray, or have mundane matters brought you to me?" {n}There is an incredibly profound quality to his voice, and he speaks with mesmerising timbre.{/n}
